This is our go to resort when we are staying on Disney Property! It's fun for all ages, especially looking back on all the past decades and seeing all the popular themed items from that era. It's decorated with lots of fun nostalgic themed items...

This was our third stay at Pop, and each time we are very impressed and happy with our choice. We do not have kids, it's just hubby and I, so we have more than enough room. I find the beds to be really comfortable, but...
